pageTitle: ESPN - Tournament Challenge: Get in on the excitement of this year'...
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {5679=If you score the most points, you'll have a chance to win the grand prize of a $20,000 Best Buy gift card and a trip to the 2015 Maui Invitational., 4007=It's been an interesting season, as Kentucky's pursuit of a perfect season has been the biggest story throughout. There are many who believe John Calipari's Wildcats will become the first team to finish undefeated since Indiana in 1976, but there is a select group of key challengers they'll have to contend with, as only 10 different teams have occupied the top five spots in the AP poll all season., 4504=Want to be bold and take a huge underdog to reach the Final Four? If you know someone who pegged UConn to win it all last year, or even Kentucky to reach the finals, it's likely they'll never let you forget it. In the past three years, teams seeded 14th or worse have five wins in the round of 64. In 2014, it was 14th-seeded Mercer shocking Duke. Will recent results like these persuade you to go crazy with upsets, or do you expect higher seeds to hold up their end this year?, 6675=Welcome to the 2015 Men's Tournament Challenge. It's that time of year again, when all the chatter about teams involves phrases like "body of work," good wins, bad losses, and of course, RPIs, résumés and the dreaded bubble. Once the field of 68 has been announced, though, how teams got in matters little, and the excitement of filling out your bracket begins., 3588=Are you willing to bet against the overwhelming favorite from Lexington? Take your best shot to stand out from the crowd in hopes of finding your name at the top of the leaderboard in April., 6271=All you have to do is select who you think will win each of the 63 tournament games that take place from March 19 on (for those hoping to pick the First Four games, you'll have to give our Streak for the Cash game a try). For each game you get right, you earn points. The point value for a correct pick increases with each round of the tournament, culminating with the championship game on April 6. Once you've made your selections, all you do is sit back, relax and pull for your picks to survive and advance.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {12126=Play Tournament Challenge for your chance to win a $20,000 Best Buy gift card and a trip for two (2) to the 2015 Maui Jim Maui Invitational!}
